definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="97" y="-33"><field name="trigger">entity_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:HardcoreDisplay</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="2"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Hardcore</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/title @a actionbar {"text":"Permanent Death Is Enabled","color":"red"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Hardcore</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/title @a actionbar {"text":"Permanent Death Is Enabled. But your data won't be deleted","color":"green"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:Hardcore</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/title @a actionbar {"text":"Permanent Death Isn't Enabled","color":"blue"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
